channel.title: The Free Mom Hugs Tour
channel.description: The Free Mom Hugs Tour is a yearly journey of the Free Mom Hugs crew to sites of historical significane to the LGBTQ+ community. Sites visited in the past include Sontewall, Laramie Wyoming, and San Francisco. The purpose of the tour is to fulfill the mission of Free Mom Hugs: Empowering the world to celebrate the LGBTQIA+ community through visibility, education, and conversation. And yes, we still give hugs!
channel.generator: Free Mom Hugs API RSS Generator 1.00

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Day 1 of the Free Mom Hugs 2020 Virtual Tour includes a (virtual) stop in Oklahoma City as we kick off our 2020 tour journey.
